Title: The Morning After: Apple has reportedly made multiple foldable iPhone prototypes
Description: According to The Information, Apple has created two clamshell-style foldable iPhone prototypes, though they’re all in the early stages of development. If Apple were to move forward with foldable iPhones, they likely wouldn’t come to market until at least 2026…

Title: Google, Apple, Meta and other huge tech companies join US consortium to advance responsible AI
Description:

Title: Apple thanked a man charged with defrauding them out of more than $2.5 million in gift cards and electronics
Description: A San Francisco man was arrested and charged with defrauding Apple. Apple later acknowledged him for his "assistance."

Description:

Title: Apple is reportedly working on prototypes for at least 2 foldable iPhones
Description: Apple has had its eye on foldable phone tech for years, and a new report indicates it's still tinkering with the idea of foldable iPhones.

Title: Google Rebrands Its AI Chatbot as Gemini to Take On ChatGPT
Description: Google is bringing its ChatGPT-style chatbot Bard and some other key AI features under the banner Gemini. A new, more powerful version of the chatbot, Gemini Advanced, is subscription-only.

Description: Apple has seemingly restricted the functionality of Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) in the latest beta of iOS 17.4, specifically targeting users within the European Union. The move appears to undermine the role of PWAs as viable alternatives to native apps in iOS…

Title: Apple TV, Apple Music and Apple Devices apps on Windows mean you (almost) never have to open iTunes on your PC
